name: Prahova Mountain Chalet
description: Escape to our charming chalet in the Prahova Valley. Enjoy stunning mountain views, fresh air, and a peaceful atmosphere. Perfect for families or groups seeking a relaxing getaway near hiking trails and nature. Fully equipped kitchen, cozy fireplace, and a spacious garden await.
shortDescription: Charming chalet with stunning mountain views in Comarnic.
cancellationPolicy: Flexible: Full refund 1 day prior to arrival.

homepage.title: Experience Nature's Embrace
homepage.description: Welcome to our home, and thank you for choosing to stay with us. This place is close to our hearts, and we hope it will become a warm spot for you too. Settle in, unwind, and let the magic of place weave its spell.

highlights.title: Mountain Retreat
highlights.description: Escape to our serene chalet nestled in the majestic foothills

highlights.title: Family Friendly
highlights.description: A perfect playground for children with zip line, hammocks, and swings

highlights.title: Nature Connection
highlights.description: Breathe fresh mountain air while enjoying stunning valley views

highlights.title: Local Exploration
highlights.description: Discover the rich history and natural wonders of Prahova Valley

homepage.title: Meet Your Host
homepage.name: Bogdan
homepage.description: Hello, my name is Bogdan and I'm happy to share my house with you. I built this place some years ago as a family retreat and basecamp for our mountain adventures... It's a place where each stone tells a tale, and every corner holds some warmth. For me, you're more than just guests - you're part of the story that continues to grow with the joy of all who stay.

homepage.title: Unique Amenities
homepage.description: The house offers the perfect backdrop for family and friends to relish the outdoors and unwind. Evenings could well-spent enjoying the cozy indoor fireplace or grilling on the outdoor BBQ. The yard, with its playground, zip line and hammocks is ideal for fun and relaxation.

features.title: BBQ Area
features.description: Right next to the terrace, our BBQ is set up for your grilling pleasures, fully equipped with essential tools for perfect evening cookouts.

features.title: 30m Zip Line
features.description: The zip line is undoubtedly the children's favourite. With a length of about 30m, it can safely support even an adult of max 90 kg.

features.title: Fire Pit
features.description: Beside the BBQ, our fire pit with a 15 litre cauldron is perfect for cozy nights and outdoor cooking.

features.title: Hammocks
features.description: Several hammocks, set among trees, offer a tranquil escape for reading or relaxing in nature's embrace.

attractions.name: Dracula Castle
attractions.description: Located in Transylvania, Bran Castle is steeped in myth as the reputed home of Dracula. This 14th-century fortress, with its dramatic towers and ramparts, houses intriguing medieval artifacts and provides a deep dive into Romanian history.

attractions.name: Ialomita Cave
attractions.description: Located in Bucegi National Park, the cave is a 480-meter-long geological marvel. Known for its stalactites and historical monastery entrance, it offers a brief yet captivating 40-minute tour.

attractions.name: 7 Ladders Canyon
attractions.description: It offers an exhilarating climb through a series of dramatic gorges and waterfalls, with metal ladders aiding the ascent. Also here is one of the longest zip-lines in Europe: 3.8 km, 37 segments.

attractions.name: The Sphinx
attractions.description: The Sphinx of the Bucegi Mountains, a natural rock formation resembling a human face, is a source of mystery and legend. Perched at 2,216 meters, it offers stunning mountain views and a touch of enigma to hikers.

featuredReviews.name: Maria D.
featuredReviews.text: We had an amazing stay at the Mountain Retreat! The cabin is beautiful and the surroundings are breathtaking. Our kids loved the zip line and we enjoyed evenings by the fireplace. Bogdan was a fantastic host.

featuredReviews.name: James T.
featuredReviews.text: Perfect mountain getaway with all the amenities you could need. The house is very clean and well-maintained. The terrace view is spectacular, especially at sunset. We'll definitely return!

featuredReviews.name: Sofia C.
featuredReviews.text: This is our second stay at Bogdan's place and it was just as wonderful as the first. The location is peaceful yet close enough to attractions. The kitchen is well-equipped, and we loved BBQing on the terrace.

homepage.title: Ready for Your Mountain Getaway?
homepage.description: Escape to the tranquility of Prahova Valley and create lasting memories with your loved ones.

footer.newsletterDescription: Receive updates about our properties and special offers.
